headline.0: Don't Turn Your Back on Disorder
headline.1: American University Puts Fossil Fuel Industry Over Students

short_description.0: As the police profession and our greater society deal with ways to rebuild (and in many cases build) relationships between the police and its citizenry, I fear that if outsider reformers call for police to ignore disorderly offenses the chasm between the police and the community will only widen.
short_description.1: On November 21, 2014, the Board of Trustees of American University voted in favor of supporting climate destruction, refusing to divest its $550 million endowment from the fossil fuel industry and placing American University firmly on the wrong side of history.

authors.0: Dr. Michael J. Jenkins, ContributorAssistant Professor, University of Scranton
